special-abilities.name: Battleborn
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.

special-abilities.name: Imposing
special-abilities.description: When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect. When you dissuade someone from escalating to physical violence by Controlling them, you have potency

special-abilities.name: Primed
special-abilities.description: Once per score, you may spend your available load, instead of stress, for a flashback or to push yourself.

special-abilities.name: Follow Through
special-abilities.description: When you take harm from someone, you learn about them and they become more susceptible to you. Immediately ask 1 question from gather information and take +1d against them.

special-abilities.name: Mule
special-abilities.description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.

special-abilities.name: Not To Be Trifled With
special-abilities.description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman - engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.

special-abilities.name: Every Item A Weapon
special-abilities.description: When you unleash physical violence with an improvised weapon, you have the same potency as the quality of your blade.

special-abilities.name: Overclocked
special-abilities.description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

friends-and-rivals.name: Hana
friends-and-rivals.prompts: Perhaps an instructor for your skills as a fighter? Or was military service in the family?

friends-and-rivals.name: Lily
friends-and-rivals.prompts: Perhaps someone who made your blade? Is this a high class establishment or a back alley operation?

friends-and-rivals.name: Aksel
friends-and-rivals.prompts: Perhaps from a militia that took action before some climate effects hit hard, or someone from a crew that sabotages buildings in Shelter 1?

friends-and-rivals.name: Bronx
friends-and-rivals.prompts: Maybe a corporate operative gone rogue, a ghost from your past, or a friend trained alongside you?

friends-and-rivals.name: Kwame
friends-and-rivals.prompts: Perhaps someone who patched you up in a previous line of work? How did Kwame learn the necessary skills?

Edge.trigger: You addressed a challenge with violence or intimidation.

special-abilities.name: Foresight
special-abilities.description: Two times per score you can assist a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this.

special-abilities.name: Calculating
special-abilities.description: Due to your careful planning, during downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime activity.

special-abilities.name: Connected
special-abilities.description: During downtime, you get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce heat.

special-abilities.name: Risk Averse
special-abilities.description: When you gather information through a faction you have a positive relationship with, clear 1 stress.

special-abilities.name: Improvisation
special-abilities.description: Take 2 stress to change any action roll to Finesse instead. Say how you adapt the previous action to this one.

special-abilities.name: Like Looking Into A Mirror
special-abilities.description: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.

special-abilities.name: Working An Angle
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.

special-abilities.name: The Myth, The Legend
special-abilities.description: Use one downtime activity in order to change any aspect of your physical appearance. When you leverage your reputation against someone you may spend 1 rep to take +1d to your roll.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Faint.trigger: You addressed a challenge with calculation or conspiracy

special-abilities.name: Infiltration
special-abilities.description: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you bypass security measures

special-abilities.name: Ambush
special-abilities.description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d

special-abilities.name: Pattern Recognition
special-abilities.description: When you gather information regarding entry points or exploitable habitual patterns, you have potency.

special-abilities.name: Cutting Edge
special-abilities.description: When you push yourself, choose one of the following additional benefits when wielding your blades: activate their searing capabilities, giving them potency equal to a Sunjet—or trigger the reaper drug embedded in the blades.

special-abilities.name: Expertise
special-abilities.description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action you suffer only 1 stress at most—regardless of the results of the other participants of the group action.

special-abilities.name: Synthetic Shell
special-abilities.description: You may shift your partial camouflage into active, becoming invisible for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: It lasts for a few minutes rather than moments—you become undetectable by most technology—you may traverse any surface.

special-abilities.name: Wired Reflexes
special-abilities.description: When there’s a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Wired Reflexes act simultaneously).

special-abilities.name: Ghost
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of evasion or stealth.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Fuse.trigger: You addressed a challenge with stealth or finesse.

special-abilities.name: Machined Plasma
special-abilities.description: Take 1 Stress to activate a function of your customized nanites for a few minutes: mirror someone else’s nanites with a touch—establish a link to technology within a few feet from you— transfer and store data on your nanites—extend a function for hours instead of mere minutes

special-abilities.name: The Hum
special-abilities.description: You can hear whenever there electronics of any kind nearby. When you gather information using technology, take +1d.

special-abilities.name: Hacktivist
special-abilities.description: You get an additional xp trigger: when you hinder those that perpetuate societal power structures mark xp. If your crew helped you, also mark crew xp.

special-abilities.name: Mess With The Best
special-abilities.description: When you hack as a long-term project, you get an additional downtime activity toward it. Take +1d when you resist a consequence involving Hacking

special-abilities.name: Between The Lines
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from electronic intrusions and systems, or to push yourself when you Hack them.

special-abilities.name: Rootkit
special-abilities.description: Take +1d and +1effect when Hacking above your Tier.

special-abilities.name: Haunting
special-abilities.description: You have physical modifications to your appearance that identify you as part of a sub-culture of hackers, take +1d when dealing with other members of the community.

special-abilities.name: Trust In Me
special-abilities.description: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Haunt.trigger: You addressed a challenge with technology or quick-thinking

special-abilities.name: Deadeye
special-abilities.description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at an extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon—use the environment to attempt a trick shot without penalty.

special-abilities.name: Focused
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone), or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.

special-abilities.name: Hunter Drone
special-abilities.description: Your drone is specially engineered. It gains potency when tracking a target and gains a new module: camouflaged, contact lens-linked, or breakneck speed.

special-abilities.name: Additional Drone Module
special-abilities.description: If you already have Hunter Drone, choose an additional drone module.

special-abilities.name: Scout
special-abilities.description: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, take +1d to rolls avoiding detection.

special-abilities.name: Perseverence
special-abilities.description: From hard won experience or custom tech, you can subsist in areas otherwise uninhabitable. You only take trauma when you take stress beyond your last stress box, not when you fill it.

special-abilities.name: Tough As Nails
special-abilities.description: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal)

special-abilities.name: Systematic Relocation
special-abilities.description: When you use a long-range weapon from cover to Trace a target on the same scale as you, add your Wreck skill. If it is on a larger scale than you, also take +1effect.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Lens.trigger: You addressed a challenge with tracking or force.

special-abilities.name: Limit Break
special-abilities.description: When an Act of God is your Tier+1—whether by reducing it as an obstacle until it becomes your so or otherwise—you may attempt to Control it

special-abilities.name: Vocation
special-abilities.description: You’ve experienced and studied Acts of God. When you gather info regarding them, you get +1 result level

special-abilities.name: Steeled Heart
special-abilities.description: You’re immune to the terror that some Acts of God inflict on sight, and take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve.

special-abilities.name: Street-wise
special-abilities.description: When you travel to someplace new, ask a question from gather information for free. When you Network in an area you hold turf, take +1d.

special-abilities.name: Daredevil
special-abilities.description: When you accept a Ripple on a desperate roll, you gain +1d and +1 effect.

special-abilities.name: Altered Carbon
special-abilities.description: You have +1 trauma box. When you interact with an Act of God while embodying a feature of it, take +1 effect. (ACT OF GOD FEATURES: ALLURING—CRUEL—FEROCIOUS—MONSTROUS—RADIANT—SINISTER—SERENE-TRANSCENDENT—UNKNOWABLE)

special-abilities.name: Trade Craft
special-abilities.description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: safely traverse through or around an Act of God equal to your Tier+1— summon an Act of God in the immediate vicinity equal to your Tier+1 (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).

special-abilities.name: Seasoned
special-abilities.description: You may use your special armor to resist a consequence resulting directly from an Act of God or to push yourself when you deal with one

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Quirk.trigger: You addressed a challenge with daring or investigation.

special-abilities.name: Inventor
special-abilities.description: When you invent or craft something mechanical, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one schematic already known

special-abilities.name: Schemer
special-abilities.description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long-term project clocks that involve crafting something or learning a new schematic.

special-abilities.name: Technician
special-abilities.description: You are never affected by Tier or quality when you Modify electronic or mechanical systems

special-abilities.name: Gearhead
special-abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from mechanical failure, or to push yourself when inventing, crafting, or destroying something mechanical.

special-abilities.name: Structure Hitter
special-abilities.description: When you Wreck something larger in scale than you and your crew, take +1d and +1effect.

special-abilities.name: Physician
special-abilities.description: You can Modify the human body to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may Study a disease or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls

special-abilities.name: Saboteur
special-abilities.description: When you Wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be, and the damage is hidden from casual inspection.

special-abilities.name: Eidetic Memory
special-abilities.description: When you’ve witnessed something destroyed or disassembled, take +1d to making a schematic for it and crafting it.

special-abilities.name: Veteran
special-abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.

Torque.trigger: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.
